version_description:
Important Upgrade
1. VITE is airdropping! Download new version and receive rewards!
2. Added DISCOVER, and you could find Vite’s latest campaigns and cryptocurrency news here.

New Update: 1.4.1 Version
1. Bugs fixed, system stability promoted;
ETH and ERC20 tokens supported, airdrop, contacts maintain
GRIN token newly supported! Vite multi-token wallet supports transferring and receiving GRIN through transaction file, HTTP address, and VITE address.
GRIN token newly supported! Vite multi-token wallet supports transferring and receiving GRIN through transaction file, HTTP address, and VITE address.
This version is built on Vite pre-main net whose releasing on May 21st, 2019 symbolizes Vite main net's online procedure kicking off.

1. GRIN wallet updated, transaction details newly added, transaction process displayed clearly.
2. VITE conversion newly added, quick converting ERC20 VITE into VITE at Vite network supported.
A new airdrop regulation is performed in this new version, missions which pump up the amount of airdrop are provided.

Cross-chain receiving ETH on Vite network and cross-chain transferring ETH are newly supported.
Upgraded to Grin v2.0.0.

This version’s changes include:
A new function named ViteConnect, ViteConnect is a breakthrough which connects Web end to App end with private keys only stored at App end. When a user creates a transaction at the Web end, they can confirm the transaction at the App end, in this way, ViteConnect makes blockchain products safer and more convenient.
Stake withdraw.

This version’s changes include:
1. A new function named ViteConnect, ViteConnect is a breakthrough which connects Web end to App end with private keys only stored at App end. When a user creates a transaction at the Web end, they can confirm the transaction at the App end, in this way, ViteConnect makes blockchain products safer and more convenient.
2. Cross-chain transferring Vite ETH and cross-chain receiving ETH
3. Cross-chain transferring Vite USDT and cross-chain receiving ERC20 USDT

This version’s changes include:
Several bug fixes and performance improvements
A new tab where you can buy native VITE with ETH on Vite Chain.

This version’s changes include:
Exchange Asset is added in Asset Module.
Several bug fixes and performance improvements.

Vite Multi-Chain Wallet + Vite decentralized exchange
This updates includes bug fixes, performance improvements and the following new functions:
1. Add specific trading pairs to Favorite page
2. Switch pairs on ViteX trading panel
3. Supported in-account assets transfer
4. Added market search page

Vite Multi-Chain Wallet + Vite decentralized exchange
This updates includes bug fixes, performance improvements and the following new functions:
1. Add specific trading pairs to Favorite page
2. Switch pairs on ViteX trading panel
3. Supported in-account assets transfer
4. Added market search page

Vite Multi-Chain Wallet + Vite decentralized exchange
This updates includes bug fixes, performance improvements and the following new functions:

Vite Multi-Chain Wallet + Vite decentralized exchange
This updates includes bug fixes, performance improvements and the following new functions:
1. Add specific trading pairs to Favorite page
2. Switch pairs on ViteX trading panel
3. Supported in-account assets transfer
4. Added market search page
Updates include: A hot campaign of Building a Mining Team. You can invite or be invited to build a mining team to get premiere mining rewards and other benefits.
The updates include: BNB and Binance-chain tokens supported.
The updates include: BNB and Binance-chain tokens supported.
New version has got bugs fixed, update and enjoy better transaction experiences.

3.4.0 new version upgrade
1.Grin hard fork upgrade
2.ViteConnect function optimization
Optimize product details.

Max Vite Address: 100
Max ETH Adddress: 100
Supportive of In-App ETH transaction history review

ViteX exchange (mobile) is integrated into Vite Wallet, and will provide a smoother user experience. The role of Vite Wallet will also be upgraded from a single-purpose mobile wallet to a one-stop crypto asset management tool with both wallet and exchange functions.

1. Add mining icons to reading pair page;
2. Candle bar page: add 2 hour and 4hour options;
3. Improved text description
4. Bug fix.

1. Fix bug
2. Adapt to iPhone 12
Bug fixed
